selection.desc: N fingers = N words (index + middle = 2 words)
Index + thumb, start with a pinch then stretch out to select
Both indexes, start with slightly close position then stretch out to start selection
No selection (used replaceSingle: deleted one word at a time)
Double tap to start selection, slide the index to select, then one tap to end the selection
One tap using the right index to indicate the start of selection, then move to select, move up to end selection
Start with a pinch, the expand vertically and slide right to select, then pinch to end selection
Tap with the right index to indicate the start of the selection, move the index to start selection, then double tap to end selection

gestures.desc: Swipe the right hand left down
Swipe the whole right hand up to delete
Slide the right index down to cut it, then typing
Double tap using index + middle fingers of the right hand
